name: The Emperor and King - Final Version
name_original: The Emperor and King - Final Version
description: Time travel back to the year 1287 to find out more about the story of two individuals, Markus and Luci. Although these two have never really liked each other, they managed to maintain peace until one incident changed that forever. Well, they were half-blooded brothers after all. Emperor  Markus Peter Yuai (Aurellian Empire) was enraged to find out that Emperor Lucius Alfonso Yuai (Yuai Empire)  slaughtered his sister, who have helped him throughout his emotional instability the past many years. Life as we know it has changed for them and their intense battle will lead to uncertain events that you will only be able to find out by clicking the "play button".
